TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为用户在托管与 COM 互操作方案中自定义互操作存根提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for user customization of interop stubs in managed-to-COM interop scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性，互操作的开发人员有关于封送处理的知识和互操作调用来执行以下的内部工作情况：This attribute enables interop developers who have knowledge about marshaling and the inner workings of interop calls to do the following: - 在生成时，而不是运行时充分利用自定义互操作的存根。Take advantage of customized interop stubs at build time instead of run time. - 调试自定义互操作的存根。Debug customized interop stubs. - 提供在存根中运行时不提供封送处理功能。Provide marshaling capabilities within a stub that the runtime does not provide. - 提供特定于用户的方法调度功能。Provide user-specific method dispatch capabilities. 指定托管到本机 COM 互操作的相应存根 （stub） 方法的接口中的方法上应用该特性。You apply the attribute on a method in an interface to specify a corresponding stub method for managed-to-native COM interop. 如果在运行时遇到此属性时，公共语言运行时不动态生成互操作的存根。If this attribute is encountered during run time, the common language runtime does not dynamically generate an interop stub. 相反，它会调用已在生成时创建的自定义存根。Instead, it invokes the custom stub that was created at build time. 属性具有以下特征：The attribute has the following characteristics: - 特性可用于仅在从标记的接口的方法上`[ComImport]`。The attribute can be used only on methods from interfaces that are marked `[ComImport]`. 如果该属性将应用于非接口类型，则忽略由运行时它。If the attribute is applied to non-interface types, it is ignored by the runtime. - 该属性上的接口中相同的方法可以使用仅一次。The attribute can be used only once on the same method in an interface. 如果不止一次使用它，编译器将生成重复的属性错误。If it is used more than once, the compiler generates a duplicated attribute error. - 该属性不是可继承基接口中。The attribute is not inheritable from a base interface. 该特性，必须显式分配的派生的接口。Derived interfaces must explicitly assign the attribute. - 包含特性化的方法的程序集还必须包含自定义的存根 （stub）。The assembly that contains the attributed method must also contain the customized stub. 重载存根 （stub） 方法都是有效的。Overloaded stub methods are valid. 虽然你指定的类型和存根 （stub） 方法的名称，运行时将发现相应的存根。Although you specify only the type and the name of the stub method, the runtime will discover the corresponding stub. 这是通过检查接口方法上的所有自变量，然后再执行完整签名匹配使用显式`this`指针。It does this by examining all the arguments on the interface method, and then performing full signature matching by using an explicit `this` pointer. 还有可能接口共享相同的存根 （stub） 方法; 中的多个方法但是，你应小心使用共享存根 （stub） 时。It is also possible for multiple methods in an interface to share the same stub method; however, you should be careful when you use shared stubs. > [!NOTE] > 存根 （stub） 方法必须是静态的。Stub methods must be static. 无法通知运行时，必须在生成时，而不是用下面的 C# 代码的运行时使用自定义互操作存根 （stub）：You could inform the runtime to use a customized interop stub at build time instead of run time with the following C# code: ``` [ComImport] interface IMyInterface { [ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute(typeof(TestStubClass), "ForwardTestStub")] void GetString (string arg); } ``` 然后可以使用下面的代码来声明相应的存根 （stub） 方法：You could then use the following code to declare the corresponding stub method: ``` class TestStubClass { internal static void ForwardTestStub(IMyInterface thisObject, string arg) {…} } ```

The name of the stub method.

summary.span: 使用指定的类类型和方法名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified class type and method name.

exception.span: 该方法不是静态或非泛型方法。

span.span: The method is not static or non-generic.

exception.span: 该方法的参数列表与存根的预期参数列表不匹配。

span.span: The method's parameter list does not match the expected parameter list for the stub.

exception.span: 由于存根方法具有私有或受保护的可访问性，或由于安全问题，包含托管互操作方法的接口无权访问存根方法。

span.span: The interface that contains the managed interop method has no access to the stub method, because the stub method has private or protected accessibility, or because of a security issue.
